results.title: Metformin for pregnancy and beyond: the pros and cons.
results.text_hl: Despite its increasing use, controversy remains surrounding its benefits and risks. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ effectively reduces hyperglycaemia for the mother during pregnancy and it reduces rates of @DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@neonatal hypoglycaemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Newman C, Dunne FP. Metformin for pregnancy and beyond: the pros and cons. Diabet Med. 2022 Mar;39(3):e14700. PMID: 34569082
citations.BibTeX: @article{34569082, title={Metformin for pregnancy and beyond: the pros and cons.}, author={Newman C and Dunne FP}, journal={Diabet Med}, volume={39}, number={3}, pages={e14700}}

results.title: Metformin combined with insulin in women with gestational diabetes mellitus: a propensity score-matched study.
results.text_hl: METHODS: This is a retrospective study, using the Portuguese National Registry of GDM (2012-2017), of @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ treated with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ +- @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Primary endpoints were @<m>DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@obstetric and neonatal complications@@@.

citations.NLM: Chaves C, Cunha F, Martinho M, Garrido S, Silva-Vieira M, Estevinho C, Melo A, Figueiredo O, Morgado A, Almeida MC, Almeida M. Metformin combined with insulin in women with gestational diabetes mellitus: a propensity score-matched study. Acta Diabetol. 2021 May;58(5):615-621. PMID: 33459895

results.title: Metformin in gestational diabetes: physiological actions and clinical applications.
results.text_hl: On the basis of current evidence, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces gestational @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@neonatal hypoglycaemia@@@ and @DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ and increases @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity.

citations.NLM: Mason T, Alesi S, Fernando M, Vanky E, Teede HJ, Mousa A. Metformin in gestational diabetes: physiological actions and clinical applications. Nat Rev Endocrinol. 2024 Oct 25;():. PMID: 39455749

results.title: A randomised placebo-controlled trial of the effectiveness of early metformin in addition to usual care in the reduction of gestational diabetes mellitus effects (EMERGE): study protocol
results.text_hl: The overall objective of the EMERGE trial is to determine if, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@GDM@@@ managed with usual care, the early introduction of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ vs. placebo reduces (a) the need for @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ use or hyperglycaemia (primary outcome); (b) excessive maternal @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@; (c) @<m>DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@maternal and neonatal morbidities@@@; and (d) cost of treatment.

citations.NLM: Dunne F, Newman C, Devane D, Smyth A, Alvarez-Iglesias A, Gillespie P, Browne M, O'Donnell M. A randomised placebo-controlled trial of the effectiveness of early metformin in addition to usual care in the reduction of gestational diabetes mellitus effects (EMERGE): study protocol Trials. 2022 Sep 21;23(1):795. PMID: 36131291

results.title: Neonatal Outcomes in Patients with Gestational Diabetes Mellitus Treated with Metformin: A Retrospective Study in Saudi Arabia.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to evaluate the safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in relation to @<m>DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@neonatal complications@@@, compared to treatment with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and/or specialized diets.

citations.NLM: Aburisheh KH, Barhoush MM, Alahmari AN, Altasan ZA, Alharthi MH. Neonatal Outcomes in Patients with Gestational Diabetes Mellitus Treated with Metformin: A Retrospective Study in Saudi Arabia. Biomedicines. 2024 Sep 7;12(9):. PMID: 39335553

results.title: The efficacy and safety of metformin alone or as an add-on therapy to insulin in pregnancy with GDM or T2DM: A systematic review and meta-analysis of 21 randomized controlled trials.
results.text_hl: More studies with long-term follow-up of offspring exposed to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in utero are needed to provide evidence for the future use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in pregnancy.

citations.NLM: He K, Guo Q, Ge J, Li J, Li C, Jing Z. The efficacy and safety of metformin alone or as an add-on therapy to insulin in pregnancy with GDM or T2DM: A systematic review and meta-analysis of 21 randomized controlled trials. J Clin Pharm Ther. 2022 Feb;47(2):168-177. PMID: 34363237

results.title: Pregnancy Outcomes: Effects of Metformin (POEM) study: a protocol for a long-term, multicentre, open-label, randomised controlled trial in gestational diabetes mellitus
results.text_hl: Several meta-analyses comparing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ showed a lower incidence of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@LGA@@@ (pooled risk ratio (RR): 0.80 (0.64-0.99)) and @DISEASE_Fetal_Macrosomia @DISEASE_MESH:D005320 @@@macrosomia@@@ (pooled RR: 0.60 (0.45-0.79)), pregnancy induced @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ (pooled RR: 0.56 (0.37-0.85)), @<m>DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@neonatal hypoglycaemia@@@ (pooled RR: 0.63 (0.45-0.87)) and neonatal intensive care unit admission (pooled RR: 0.72 (0.59-0.88)).

citations.NLM: van Hoorn EGM, van Dijk PR, Prins JR, Lutgers HL, Hoogenberg K, Erwich JJHM, Kooy A. Pregnancy Outcomes: Effects of Metformin (POEM) study: a protocol for a long-term, multicentre, open-label, randomised controlled trial in gestational diabetes mellitus BMJ Open. 2022 Mar 30;12(3):e056282. PMID: 35354633

results.title: Metformin for the management of gestational diabetes mellitus.
results.journal: Aust N Z J Obstet Gynaecol
results.text_hl: A number of studies reported lower rates of @<m>DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@neonatal hypoglycaemia@@@, and one reported higher rates of @DISEASE_Premature_Birth @DISEASE_MESH:D047928 @@@preterm birth@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group.

results.title: Metformin for the treatment of gestational diabetes: An updated meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Bayesian analysis revealed that the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was consistently higher than @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ with a probability of over 98% on these two @<m>DISEASE_Infant_Newborn_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007232 @@@neonatal complications@@@.
